COMMAND.name: show ip access-lists
COMMAND.ACTION: if test "${access-list-name}" = ""; then python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/target/sonic-cli.py get_list_base_acl_sets_acl_set else python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/target/sonic-cli.py get_acl_set_acl_entries ${access-list-name} ACL_IPV4 fi

COMMAND.name: ip access-group
COMMAND.ACTION: if test "${direction-switch}" = "in"; then python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/target/sonic-cli.py post_list_base_interfaces_interface ${access-list-name} ACL_IPV4 ${iface} ingress else python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/target/sonic-cli.py post_list_base_interfaces_interface ${access-list-name} ACL_IPV4 ${iface} egress fi

COMMAND.name: no ip access-group
COMMAND.ACTION: if test "${direction-switch}" = "in"; then python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/target/sonic-cli.py delete_interface_ingress_acl_sets_ingress_acl_set ${iface} ${access-list-name} ACL_IPV4 else python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/target/sonic-cli.py delete_interface_egress_acl_sets_egress_acl_set ${iface} ${access-list-name} ACL_IPV4 fi

PARAM.name: access-list-name
PARAM.help: Name of the IPv4 access-list (Max size 140)

PARAM.name: access-list-name
PARAM.help: Name of the IPv6 access-list (Max size 140)

PARAM.name: description
PARAM.help: Description of the IP prefix list

PARAM.name: description
PARAM.help: Description of the IP prefix list

PARAM.name: expanded
PARAM.help: Add an expanded community list entry

PARAM.name: standard
PARAM.help: Add a standard community list entry

PARAM.name: expanded
PARAM.help: Add an expanded extcommunity list entry

PARAM.name: standard
PARAM.help: Add a standard extcommunity list entry

PARAM.name: access-list-name
PARAM.help: Name of the MAC access-list (Max size 140)
